statements: SELECT * FROM channel_performance WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type FROM channel_performance WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM channel_performance WHERE channel_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT channel_name, performance_metrics FROM channel_performance WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, content_type FROM channel_performance ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM channel_performance WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type FROM channel_performance WHERE platform_type = 'Instagram';
SELECT channel_id, performance_metrics->>'engagement' AS engagement FROM channel_performance WHERE content_type = 'Video' ORDER BY engagement DESC;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type, content_type FROM channel_performance WHERE channel_id IN (2, 4) AND platform_type = 'YouTube';
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, performance_metrics->'impressions' AS impressions FROM channel_performance WHERE content_type = 'Article' ORDER BY impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_distribution_channels;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type FROM content_distribution_channels WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT creation_date, channel_name FROM content_distribution_channels ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type, creation_date FROM content_distribution_channels WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT tracking_id, performance_metric, metric_value FROM performance_tracking WHERE tracking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM content_distribution_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT channel_name, platform_type FROM content_distribution_channels WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';

SELECT channel_name, SUM(metric_value) AS total_metric_value FROM content_distribution_channels JOIN performance_tracking ON content_distribution_channels.channel_id = performance_tracking.channel_id GROUP BY channel_name;

SELECT channel_name, performance_metric, tracking_date FROM content_distribution_channels JOIN performance_tracking ON content_distribution_channels.channel_id = performance_tracking.channel_id WHERE metric_value > 1000 AND platform_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, platform_type FROM content_distribution_channels WHERE channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM performance_tracking WHERE tracking_date = '2021-06-30');
SELECT * FROM content_distribution_channels;
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM content_distribution_channels WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM content_distribution_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT website_id, views, time_on_page FROM content_performance_website WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT social_media_id, likes, comments FROM content_performance_social_media WHERE shares < 50 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM content_distribution_channels;
SELECT website_id, views, time_on_page FROM content_performance_website WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY views DESC;

SELECT website_id, clicks, channel_name FROM content_performance_website JOIN content_distribution_channels ON content_performance_website.channel_id = content_distribution_channels.channel_id ORDER BY clicks DESC;

SELECT channel_name, likes, shares, comments FROM content_performance_social_media JOIN content_distribution_channels ON content_performance_social_media.channel_id = content_distribution_channels.channel_id;

SELECT platform, (views + clicks) AS total_engagement FROM content_performance_website JOIN content_distribution_channels ON content_performance_website.channel_id = content_distribution_channels.channel_id ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentChannels;
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM ContentChannels WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT website_name, website_url FROM Websites WHERE website_id > 100;
SELECT social_media_name, followers_count FROM SocialMedia WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT app_name, downloads_count FROM MobileApps ORDER BY downloads_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentChannels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM ContentChannels WHERE platform = 'YouTube';
SELECT website_name, website_url FROM Websites WHERE website_url LIKE '%.com';
SELECT social_media_name, followers_count FROM SocialMedia WHERE followers_count > 100000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT app_name, downloads_count FROM MobileApps WHERE downloads_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 10000 ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_content;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM website_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT post_text, post_platform, post_date FROM social_media_content ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_category FROM app_content WHERE app_platform = 'iOS';
SELECT content_id, website_id, views FROM content_performance_website WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT * FROM social_media_content WHERE post_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM website_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' AND publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_content WHERE post_platform = 'Instagram' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT content_title, views, clicks FROM website_content JOIN content_performance_website ON website_content.content_id = content_performance_website.content_id WHERE views > 1000 AND clicks > 500 ORDER BY clicks DESC, views ASC;
